fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, use an Illegal Technique that was not used the previous night.
- After using an Illegal Technique, you will be Yellow Carded, forcing you to not be able to speak as if you were blackmailed.

fields.name: Illegal Techniques:
fields.value:
- High Tackle: Deal a basic attack to a player.
- Obstruction: Target a Rugby player who has the Ball. Gain powerful defense and redirect any attacks they get to yourself.
- Bring Down Maul: Target two players. Reduce their defense level by 1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Factional chat
- Gains powerful defense if carrying the Ball
- Replaces abilities with factional kill if carrying the Ball

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the team.
